text: (5)您知悉互聯網存在諸多不確定性因素，因此理解並同意，如因不可抗力、網路、通訊線路故障、電腦大規模癱瘓及活動中存在大面積作弊行為等非主辦方原因致使本活動出現異常情況或難以繼續開展的，主辦方有權採取包 括但不限於通過各種方式消除異常情況或調整、暫停、取消本活動等措施，因此造成損失的，主辦方不承擔任何責任。
trans: (5) You acknowledge the uncertainty of the internet, and agree that if, due to force majeure, network issues, communication line failures, computer system-wide failures, or widespread cheating during the event, abnormal situations arise or the event becomes difficult to continue for reasons beyond the control of the organizers, the organizers have the right to take measures including but not limited to eliminating abnormal situations or adjusting, suspending, or canceling the event. In such cases, the organizers are not responsible for any resulting losses.
